sections.body: Sheet is a customizable Sheet that appears on screen with the click of a button. There are diverse customizations provided by OakUI in the Sheet component which are available to the users for customizing the UI components as per their requirement.

sections.heading: Styling
sections.body: Styling brings cohesion to the Sheet component with all the properties available with OakUI tools. Each configuration in these tools allows the user to display a variety of Sheet fields as the end-user desires. Each customization feature in styling has alternatives available for the end-user to decide upon.
Each Sheet component has its importance of appearance according to where and how it is being displayed. The user can make use of these tools to equip the ideal design.

sections.heading: Native Support
sections.body: Native Support is provided by OakUI, being a distinct feature, it enables characteristics such as, the Sheet to get embedded into the format of the device that is being used. The look and feel of the component would feel no different from the other components we see in the end-user's device.
